flawed_nl_solution:
He had 5 Kit-Kats and had 3 times that amount in Kisses so he had 5*3 = <<5*3=51>>51 Hershey kisses
He had 10 Baby Ruths and half that amount in Reese Peanut butter cups so he had 10/2 = <<10/2=5>>5 Reese Peanut Butter cups
He had 11 lollipops and gave 5 to his sister so he now had 11-5 = <<11-5=6>>6 lollipops
When you add up all of the candy, he had 5 Kit-Kats, 51 Hershey kisses, 10 Baby Ruths, 5 Reese cups, 8 Nerds and 6 lollipops so 5+51+10+5+8+6 = <<5+51+10+5+8+6=85>>85 pieces of candy
#### 85

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
